properties.entry: SELECT A.RNUM , A.POST_NO , A.CATEGORY_NO , A.CATEGORY_NAME , A.POST_TITLE , A.POST_CONTENT , A.USER_NO , A.USER_NAME , A.VIEW_NO , A.CREATION_DATE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , B.POST_NO , B.CATEGORY_NO , B.CATEGORY_NAME , B.POST_TITLE , B.POST_CONTENT , B.USER_NO , B.USER_NAME , B.VIEW_NO , B.CREATION_DATE FROM (SELECT C.POST_NO , C.CATEGORY_NO , D.CATEGORY_NAME , C.POST_TITLE , C.POST_CONTENT , C.USER_NO , E.USER_NAME , C.VIEW_NO , C.CREATION_DATE FROM INFO_BOARD C JOIN INFO_CATEGORY D ON (C.CATEGORY_NO = D.CATEGORY_NO) JOIN MEMBER E ON(C.USER_NO = E.USER_NO) ORDER BY C.POST_NO DESC ) B ) A WHERE A.RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
INSERT INTO INFO_BOARD A ( A.POST_NO , A.POST_TITLE , A.POST_CONTENT , A.VIEW_NO , A.CREATION_DATE , A.CATEGORY_NO , A.USER_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_INFO_BOARD.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , 0 , SYSDATE , ? , 1 )

SELECT A.POST_NO , A.CATEGORY_NO , C.CATEGORY_NAME , A.POST_TITLE , A.POST_CONTENT , A.USER_NO , B.USER_NAME , A.VIEW_NO , A.CREATION_DATE FROM INFO_BOARD A JOIN MEMBER B ON (A.USER_NO = B.USER_NO) JOIN INFO_CATEGORY C ON (A.CATEGORY_NO = C.CATEGORY_NO) WHERE A.POST_NO = ?
UPDATE INFO_BOARD A SET A.VIEW_NO = (SELECT B.VIEW_NO FROM INFO_BOARD B WHERE POST_NO = ? ) + 1 WHERE A.POST_NO = ?
